title: Cruella De Vil

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone each night to determine if they are in possession of a puppy.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the end of Night 1, all players that were visited by any player will receive a puppy. They will know they received one.
- Each night, select a player to check them for puppies. If they have one, you will roleblock them and take it, and you will gain Basic Defense for the night.
- If a player with a puppy attempts to visit you, their ability will fail. Additionally, any visits to you on Night 1 will fail.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make sure that no players alive at the end of the game have a puppy.
